Sentencas: Ba0.5Sr0.5Co0.8Fe0.2O3-delta (BSCF) is a mixed conducting oxide that shows high oxygen permeability to perform as a ceramic membrane and high electrochemical activity for oxygen reduction to perform as a cathode of solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Surface exchange and bulk diffusion properties of Ba0.5Sr0.5Co0.8Fe0.2O3-δ mixed conductor

Sentencas: Both performances are closely related to the bulk and surface properties of the BSCF oxide.
Titulo: Surface exchange and bulk diffusion properties of Ba0.5Sr0.5Co0.8Fe0.2O3-δ mixed conductor

Sentencas: In this study, the chemical bulk diffusion coefficient (D-chem) and chemical surface exchange coefficient (k(chem)) of BSCF at various temperatures and oxygen partial pressures are determined by an electrical conductivity relaxation (ECR) method.
Titulo: Surface exchange and bulk diffusion properties of Ba0.5Sr0.5Co0.8Fe0.2O3-δ mixed conductor

Sentencas: Both Dchem and kchem are found to be dependent on p(o2) with positive effect.
Titulo: Surface exchange and bulk diffusion properties of Ba0.5Sr0.5Co0.8Fe0.2O3-δ mixed conductor

Sentencas: Ea of D-chem and k(chem) are respectively 111 +/- 5 and 110 +/- 6 kJ mol(-1) between 600 and 800 degrees C. Oxygen-ion diffusion and tracer diffusion coefficients are estimated from D-chem and compared with the literature results.
Titulo: Surface exchange and bulk diffusion properties of Ba0.5Sr0.5Co0.8Fe0.2O3-δ mixed conductor

Sentencas: Ionic conductivities are further derived according to the Nernst-Einstein relation.
Titulo: Surface exchange and bulk diffusion properties of Ba0.5Sr0.5Co0.8Fe0.2O3-δ mixed conductor

Sentencas: The poisoning effect of CO2 on the performances of BSCF is further investigated by the ECR method in combination with oxygen temperature-programmed desorption technique.
Titulo: Surface exchange and bulk diffusion properties of Ba0.5Sr0.5Co0.8Fe0.2O3-δ mixed conductor

Sentencas: The presence of CO2 causes a substantial decrease in k(chem), however, the surface kinetics can be recovered by performing re-calcination in an oxidative atmosphere at 900 degrees C, agreeing well with literature reports.
Titulo: Surface exchange and bulk diffusion properties of Ba0.5Sr0.5Co0.8Fe0.2O3-δ mixed conductor
